TopicTitle: Loading failure while trying to open the game with Sytem heat, Heat control and Near Future Eletrical.

Articles.Content:
I've been unable to open the game since I installed Heat control and system heat for Nuclear configuration and reactor configuration and Idk why, I'l be happy if someone could help me with this problem, heres the error:

Loading has failed due to an unhandled error

Failure in subsystem : Part compilation
Part: UX-0 'KerboPower' Fission Generator (NearFutureElectrical/Parts/FissionReactors/reactor-0625/reactor-0625)

System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
  at SystemHeat.ModuleSystemHeatFissionReactor.GetInfo () [0x000ae] in <2e62a3a58b7b49e4b572caf6a58e7a44>:0 
  at PartLoader.CompilePartInfo (AvailablePart newPartInfo, Part part) [0x0024e] in <4b449f2841f84227adfaad3149c8fdba>:0 
  at (wrapper dynamic-method) PartLoader+<CompileParts>d__56.PartLoader+<CompileParts>d__56.MoveNext_Patch0(PartLoader/<CompileParts>d__56)
  at KSPCommunityFixes.Performance.KSPCFFastLoader+<FrameUnlockedCoroutine>d__62.MoveNext () [0x0006c] in <f6e25c3bc9164b3cafccaf4d2ea8fa20>:0 

if I remove system heat it opens normally, weren't those mod made to work togheter (I mean Near Future and system heat)? I though that Kerbal atomics was the issue but I tried opening the game without it and still didn't work, and I also tried removing the error part from the file but it just chose another part XD. Sry for my typos english isn't my first language.

Edited January 7 by Scuty
